definition: to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: The wave are of course dispersive.
When the clouds break months, will offer all kinds of knot wind dispersed in the sea the sky.
sentences.chinese: 當雲破月來，千般糾結都將隨風彌散在水際雲天。

sentences.english: In Darcy flow , dispersion decreases as the permeability coefficient increases.
sentences.chinese: 在達西流階段，彌散度隨着滲透係數增大而減小。

sentences.english: Non-tension method and smeared crack model is applied to the analysis of concrete cracking.
sentences.chinese: 引入無拉力法和彌散裂縫分析混凝土開裂。

sentences.english: Those forces permeated the Chinese government, from local functionaries all the way to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 這種力量彌散在中國整個政府系統，從地方直到中央。

sentences.english: Active foci of demyelination may demonstrate restricted diffusion.
sentences.chinese: 脫髓鞘的活動性的病竈可以顯示爲彌散受限。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of diffuse axonal injury(DAI).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彌散性軸索損傷的診斷與治療。

sentences.english: In multipath environments, ultra-wide band signals suffer from severe time dispretion.
sentences.chinese: 超寬帶信號經多徑信道傳播會產生嚴重的時間彌散。

sentences.english: The forgeability of dispersion-strengthened copper material with high strength and high conductivity is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對高強高導彌散強化銅材料的可鍛性進行了實驗研究。

sentences.english: When blood vessels connect to form a region of diffuse vascular supply it is called an anastomosis (pl. anastomoses).
sentences.chinese: 血管聯結構成一彌散性維管聯結區，即並接。

sentences.english: Lattice Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing(LOFDM) is a promising technique for high data-rate transmission in double(namely time-frequency) dispersive channel.
sentences.chinese: 是時頻彌散信道上的一種高速數據傳輸技術。

sentences.english: The immunoreactive products were diffusely distributed in the cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 免疫反應產物彌散分佈於胞漿內。

sentences.english: The effect of modifying and dispersion treatment on the structure and properties of high Mn steel is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了變質和彌散處理對高錳鋼組織和性能的影響。

sentences.english: To the east, the first pale light of day suffused the sky above the river.
sentences.chinese: 東邊第一縷蒼白的日光彌散在河的上空。

sentences.english: Galactic nebulas are masses of diffuse material within our galaxy .
sentences.chinese: 銀河星雲是我們星系中的一團團彌散物。

sentences.english: An air passageway leading from the powder location to the dispersion chamber is closed off by the cover.
sentences.chinese: 從粉末場所通到彌散腔的空氣通道被蓋件封閉。
